scripts.awss3:init: aws s3api create-bucket --bucket superformula-api-deploy --region us-east-2 --create-bucket-configuration LocationConstraint=us-east-2
scripts.sam:package: sam package --template template.yml --output-template-file cloudformation.yml --s3-bucket superformula-api-deploy --region us-east-2
scripts.sam:deploy: sam deploy --template-file cloudformation.yml --stack-name superformula-api --capabilities CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --region us-east-2
scripts.push: npm run sam:package && npm run sam:deploy
scripts.clean: aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name superformula-api --region us-east-2 && aws cloudformation wait stack-delete-complete --stack-name superformula-api
